STD_INPUT_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: $where clause is not supported as a filter.

STD_QUERY_ERROR.message: An error occurred while executing the query.

VALIDATION_FAILED.message: Some of the fields of the %s has missing or invalid values.

TYPED_QUERY_ERROR.message: An error occurred while trying to get %s.

TYPED_SAVE_ERROR.message: An error occurred while trying to save %s.

TYPED_REMOVE_ERROR.message: An error occurred while trying to remove %s.

GOOGLE_GEO_ERROR.message: An error occurred while trying to get the coordinates [%s] from google.

OBJECT_NOT_FOUND.message: Could not find any %s that matched the query.

XML_PARSE_ERROR.message: An error occurred during parsing XML data.

UPDATE_FORBIDDEN.message: The user does not have permissions to modify the %s data.
